name: Escape (itch) (elfondo)
description:
Music by the wonderful FEREZON

Controls Move Click/tap on the left/right sides of the screen, or use "A/D"/"LEFTARROW/RIGHTARROW". You can also swap sides if you keep tapping in one direction, use this to get the highest score you can! Shoot Hit the "SPACE" key, or tap the shoot button down the bottom of the screen Passing a wave will give you a point, shooting an enemy will also add a point. Get the highest score you can!
